page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: Voluntary{Playgroup}is held in the Methodist Hall. Age range 3_4.Hope to teach the 27 children social skills. Parents pay money for each session. {Weeke Infant and Junior Schools}are separate although they are on the same site.There are a total of 276 children from 5-11.Junior classes are 34 in size.Infant classes are a bit smaller. The teachers aim to prepare children to be good world citizens and to be ready to go on to secondary education. {Comprehensive schools Henry Beaufort {and Westgate,}11-16 range have total of 1600 pupils.A wide range of subjects are taught by the total of 90 teachers. At{Peter Symonds}sixth form college the 1006 students,aged 16-19, have a wide choice of courses Approx. 420 went on to higher education in 1984.Many schools are used for adult evening classes and clubs.
